name: (Spanish) Homepage - Apply Online - Verify the redirection from DAC when RI is cancelled
id: stories/fullRegression/regressionChecklistSpanish.story;(Spanish) Homepage - Apply Online - Verify the redirection from DAC when RI is cancelled

testSteps.description: (Spanish) Homepage - Apply Online - Verify the redirection from DAC when RI is cancelled #1: {mainLinksItem=apply online}

children.description: Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on {apply online} within the main links bar
Then I click on cancel and I should be redirected to the correct spanish environment

userStory.narrative:
In order to assert that the basic functionality of https://www.disasterassistance.gov/es/ is working
As a tester
I want to run the daily regressions at least twice a day
